channel.title: OpenAI on The learning Journal of @Wardhane
channel.description: Recent content in OpenAI on The learning Journal of @Wardhane

item.title: Speak Easy: From Speech to Text with AI
item.description: Introduction One of my ambitions is to share content more often, but I often struggle with proofreading and capturing my ideas. I believe that my content is not perfect enough to be shared with a wider audience, which hinders my ability to share it. When I do have an idea for a blog, I often don’t have the time to record it because I’m in the middle of another activity. Even when I do have the time, I find it difficult to structure the content to a level that I feel is fit to share.
